casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chester Wilson JONES, Jr. No. 399P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2005 by Defendant to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
